cab.content: SECRET.W.P. ( G)(40)l96.21ST JULY, 1940.WAR CABINET.TRANS-ATLANTIC AIR SERVICE.Memorandum by tlae Minister of Aircraft Production.In Paper No.W.P. (G)(40)191 dated 19th July, theSecretary of State for A:1 r seeks approval of his proposalto use two long range flying boats immediately onweekly flights to Canada and the United States to meetthe request of the Foreign Office, Dominions Officeand Ministry of Information, for British aircommunication with North America.I ask that these flying boats be placed at thedisposal of the Ministry of Aircraft Production to transport across the Atlantic mechanics required for ourAmerican programme, and also American supplies of aluminium tubes urgently required.(Intld) B.COPY NO.Ministry of Aircraft Production.21ST JULY, 1940.
